Description: Fragment of neck and flattened handle, with gradual curve, of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-brown. Circular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Ieroteles. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0924.04.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (346)
